data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: But Isabella was short of funds. She ____ her ____ went ____ to Hainaut to ____ more ____. In ____ for ____ support, she ____ a ____ for ____ son Edward to Philippa of Hainaut. She also gave up any claims she had to the French crown.
data.partBlankContent: But Isabella was short of funds. She a__ her foll_____ went no___ to Hainaut to fi__ more sup____. In tu__ for th___ support, she negot_____ a marr____ for h__ son Edward to Philippa of Hainaut. She also gave up any claims she had to the French crown.
data.answer: 但是伊莎贝拉缺少资金。她和她的追随者前往北方的海诺寻找更多的支持。为了得到他们的支持，她为儿子爱德华和海诺的菲利帕谈妥了婚事。她还放弃了对法国王位的所有要求。
